function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of scientific risk communication in decision making","Impact":"Ineffective response to the outbreak, leading to further spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Integrate scientific findings and expert advice into decision making processes","Technologies":"Data analysis and modeling tools, expert consultation","People":"Public at large, government officials","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inadequate risk interpretation in communication","Impact":"Misunderstanding of the severity of the outbreak, leading to insufficient public health measures","Mitigation":"Provide clear and accurate risk interpretation to the public, engage with public health experts","Technologies":"Public health messaging, media coordination","People":"General public, media outlets","Owner":"Public health authorities, government communication teams"},{"Description":"Limited government information dissemination","Impact":"Lack of timely and accurate information leads to confusion and misinformation","Mitigation":"Establish clear communication channels, release regular updates on the situation","Technologies":"Social media platforms, official government websites","People":"General public, media outlets","Owner":"Government communication teams"}]}
